info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbus and north central Horry Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tabor City, or 16 miles southwest of Whiteville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tabor City, Loris, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Bughill, Sidney, Clarendon, Williams, Goretown, Crusoe Island, Brunswick and Bolton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
